Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: character()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Return current character

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(_:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read the current character and return if it is as intended. If character test returns true then move forward 1

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(string:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read the current character and return if it is as intended. If character test returns true then move forward 1

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(_:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read the current character and check if it is in a set of characters If character test returns true then move forward 1

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(count:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read next so many characters from buffer

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(until:throwOnOverflow:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read from buffer until we hit a character. Position after this is of the character we were checking for

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(untilString:throwOnOverflow:skipToEnd:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read from buffer until we hit a string. By default the position after this is of the beginning of the string we were checking for

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(until:throwOnOverflow:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read from buffer until we hit a character in supplied set. Position after this is of the character we were checking for

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(until:throwOnOverflow:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read from buffer until keyPath on character returns true. Position after this is of the character we were checking for

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(until:throwOnOverflow:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read from buffer until keyPath on character returns true. Position after this is of the character we were checking for

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: readUntilTheEnd()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read from buffer from current position until the end of the buffer

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(while:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read while character at current position is the one supplied

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(while:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read while keyPath on character at current position returns true is the one supplied

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(while:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read while closure returns true

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: read(while:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Read while character at current position is in supplied set

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: reachedEnd()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Return whether we have reached the end of the buffer

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: atStart()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Return whether we are at the start of the buffer

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: getContext()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Return context of current position (line, lineNumber, columnNumber)

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: current()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Return the character at the current position

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: advance()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Move forward one character

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: retreat()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Move back one character

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: advance(by:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Move forward so many character

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: retreat(by:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Move back so many characters

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: setPosition(_:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: unsafeCurrent()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: unsafeAdvance()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: unsafeRetreat()
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: unsafeAdvance(by:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: unsafeRetreat(by:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Undocumented

Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.name: unsafeSetPosition(_:)
Structs/HBParser.html#/s:19HummingbirdMu.abstract: Undocumented

Protocols/HBMustacheCustomRenderable.htm.abstract: Allow object to override standard hummingbird type rendering which uses

Protocols/HBMustacheParent.html.name: HBMustacheParent
Protocols/HBMustacheParent.html.abstract: Protocol for object that has a custom method for accessing their children, instead

Protocols/HBMustacheTransformable.html.name: HBMustacheTransformable
Protocols/HBMustacheTransformable.html.abstract: Objects that can have a transforms run on them. Mustache transforms are specific to this implementation

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS19Hummingbir.name: htmlEscape()

Extensions/NSNull.html.abstract: Extend NSNull to conform to HBMustacheCustomRenderable to avoid outputting <null> and returning
